title: Manage Your Business Unit | Salesforce Trailhead

questions.title: 1Why should you register leads in the Partner Community?

answers.content: A It helps Salesforce AEs make sales, which increases your PVS.
B It lets you share intelligence with other consulting partners.
C Salesforce requires you to register leads to maintain eligibility for the partner program.
D To claim your rightful throne in the partner ecosystem.

correctAnswer.content: A It helps Salesforce AEs make sales, which increases your PVS.

questions.title: 2How do you kick off the CSAT survey process?

answers.content: B Use the CSAT tool in the Partner Community.
C Send surveys out to customers via email.
D Register a complete project under the Business tab in the Partner Community.

wrongAnswers.content: A Contact Salesforce to alert us that you're ready to start generating your CSAT score.

correctAnswer.content: D Register a complete project under the Business tab in the Partner Community.

questions.title: 3What's the difference between sourced and joint sales ACV?

answers.content: A Sourced ACV is generated from sales that the consulting partner makes, while joint sales ACV is generated from sales that Salesforce makes.
B Sourced ACV occurs when a Salesforce AE helps a consulting partner close a deal, and joint sales ACV occurs when a consulting partner and Salesforce AE close a deal together.
C Sourced ACV occurs when a consulting partner generates a new opportunity for Salesforce, and joint sales ACV occurs when a consulting partner comes in to help a Salesforce AE close a deal.
D Sourced ACV is generated when a consulting partner closes a Salesforce deal, and joint sales ACV is generated when a Salesforce AE helps a consulting partner close a deal.

correctAnswer.content: C Sourced ACV occurs when a consulting partner generates a new opportunity for Salesforce, and joint sales ACV occurs when a consulting partner comes in to help a Salesforce AE close a deal.
